CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: To achieve long-term capital appreciation, with lesser emphasis placed on current income. The Company invests principally in common stocks believed by its management to have better than average growth potential. Normally, a substantially fully invested position in equities is maintained.
